name: top_free_ios_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Retrieves a list of the top free iOS apps from the App Store using the RapidAPI service.

lang.description: The language code for the results (default is 'en').

country.description: The country code for the results (default is 'us').

num.description: The number of application results to return (default is 100, with a max of 200).

category.description: The category ID to filter the applications (default is '6016').
